INSERT INTO task(task_no, title, content, startDate, endDate, state, user_no, category_no) VALUES(#{taskNo},#{title},#{content},#{startDate}, #{endDate},'active',#{users.userNo},#{category.categoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no, t.title, t.content, t.startdate, t.enddate, t.state, c.category_no, c.name FROM task t JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.category_no WHERE t.task_no = #{taskNo}

SELECT t.task_no, t.title, t.content, t.startdate, t.enddate, t.state, u.user_no, c.category_no, c.name FROM task t JOIN users u ON t.user_no = u.user_no JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.category_no WHERE u.user_no=#{userNo}
